_sText:
NEW FEATURES:

Electric chair Obstacle course Bomb bascetball Simon says room (prefab) Watch tower Couch room (AKA chair room) Bath in every cage (prefab) New weapons in armory Credits room Lots of breakable walls and vents More guns in T cages More fences and ralings to help CTs confine Ts Pool Door More spawn points More teleports Much more new breakable walls/floors, shafts and teleports "ST bombs" which when picked up by terrorists spell "ST" (short for special treatment) above their heads

BUG/GLITCH FIXES:

Fixed pool "leak" glitch (v1.0) Fixed Medic sign and football having a invalid texture (likeley caused by a custom texture) (v1.0) Fixed some guns in armory having just one clip of ammo (v1.0) Fixed small "leak" glitch at the side of the simon says room (v2.0)

HOW TO INSTALL:

Place ba_whacky_electric_jail.bsp in INSTALLDIR:\Steam\SteamApps\ your username\Counter Strike Source\cstrike\maps

HOW TO UNINSTALL:

Remove the file from the install directory

CHANGELOG: v1.0 - Initial Public release v1.1 - Added a new tower, a race setup (go into the new tower which is in the race/obstacle course and click the left set of buttons to enable race, rickt click to disable it. When in race mode everyone but the first person will get slayed once the first person touches the finish line.), fixed some bugs and added a door to the medic (heal) room (use opens). v2.0 - Fixed race, now works properly (tested), fixed several textures, fixed small leak glitch, added several decals to represent jail notices as well as grafiti and notes in the prisoner's cells, removed some of the steam in the showers, they should stop lagging now, added water drops coming from the showers, added the "ST bombs", these are bombs, which when picked up/held by the Ts, say "ST" above their head and ST meaning Special Treatment, added ways to get out of execution room and isolation. Added several custom textures packed with the BSP.

KNOWN BUGS: FIXED IN v2 A very small "leak" glitch appears on the side of the simon says room slightly sticking out of the wall. I am unable to fix this for now, since working with the simon says room is VERY hard (don't worry, its only visual and VERY hard to spot unless you inspect all nooks and cranies on the map, chances are 99.99% of the people in your server won't see it). FIXED IN v2

Enjoy!
